name: Galawat Ka Kababs Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Galawat Ka Kababs Recipe: Mince ½ kg Ginger Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Red Chili Powder 1½ tsp Salt 1 tsp All Spice 1 tsp Papaya (raw) 1 tbsp Coriander Seeds (roasted & ground) 1 tbsp Cumin Seeds (roasted &ground) 1 tsp Desiccated Coconut (roasted &ground)1 tbsp Poppy Seeds(roasted &ground) 1 tbsp Coriander Leaves 2 tbsp Onion (chopped) 1
instructions: Marinate the mince with all the given ingredients and keep for 30 mins. Make flat kebabs and shallow fry. Give dum of coal.
